meanings.sent1: My nana always bakes delicious cookies for me.
meanings.sent2: I love spending time with my nana on weekends.
meanings.sent3: When my nana starts dancing, everyone laughs and joins in.
meanings.sent4: Her wisdom and warmth make my nana a shining light in our family.
meanings.sent5: The image of my nana's smiling face is etched in my memory.

meanings.sent1: I enjoy eating a ripe nana for breakfast every day.
meanings.sent2: The grocery store had a sale on nanas, so I bought a bunch.
meanings.sent3: My brother tried to juggle nanas, but they kept slipping out of his hands.
meanings.sent4: The sweet aroma of a freshly peeled nana filled the room.
meanings.sent5: The smooth texture of the nana made it a delightful snack.

meanings.definition: A unit of force equal to one billion newtons.
meanings.sent1: The rocket engine produced a thrust of one nana during liftoff.
meanings.sent2: The massive machine required a force of several nanas to operate.
meanings.sent3: In the physics lab, they measured the impact of a nana on different surfaces.
meanings.sent4: The bridge's design had to withstand the pressure of multiple nanas.
meanings.sent5: The nana exerted a tremendous amount of force, causing the object to move swiftly.
